name: open-graph-visualizer
description: A tool to preview how your website's link previews will appear across different social media platforms
author: Vighnesh Brahme

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run start" "cd backend && npm run start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run build" "cd backend && npm run build"
scripts.install: concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"
